snippet: An American aid worker was infected while working in Sierra Leone, and he may have exposed colleagues in West Africa to the virus.
abstract: American clinician working with Partners in Health to combat Ebola in Sierra Leone is evacuated to National Institutes of Health clinical center in Bethesda, Md, after becoming infected with the virus.
lead_paragraph: An American aid worker was infected while working in Sierra Leone, and he may have exposed colleagues in West Africa to the virus.

headline.main: U.S. Clinician With Ebola Under Care in Maryland
headline.print_headline: U.S. Clinician With Virus Under Care in Maryland
